scripts.zip-all: cp scrape-all.mjs index.mjs && zip -r scrape-all.zip . -i index.mjs -i 'node_modules/lowdb/*' -i 'node_modules/steno/*'
scripts.zip-ca: cp california/california.mjs index.mjs && npm run rewrite-utils && zip -r california/california.zip . -i 'node_modules/*'  -i index.mjs -i utils.mjs -i california/template.yml && rm index.mjs
